the writing feels cringey sometimes but overall its really solid

if you love mystery scifi horror story telling at its finest adventure thrill and of course psychological madnessyou will absolutely love this beautifully done game it has everything it will even make you cry a game hasnt moved me in such a way in a very long time 1010 and i will be having my husband play so i can watch him do so this game was honestly such a gift and honor to play thank you to the creators

me throughout the entire game wut wut wait i think i got that no wait huh wut wut wut ohhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh wait no wut dafuq oh shit i understand it all now omg fantastic  god damn i love a good story that i can just chew on  for 25 you cant ask for better voice acting sound design music environments and graphics and story telling along side some very impressing horror moments that had me genuinely panicked and screaming

one of the best games i have played in a long time

this is a game that will send you on a surreal ride it is not for the faint of heart as it does touch some sensitive topics but within the horror landscape it does it well in a sensitive manner and respectfully this is art not just a game it is basically perfection when it comes to storytelling i recommend everyone play no delay  dive right in again and again and again

philosophical nquiries moral conflicts  it is an independent game inspired by the 1984 novel the game is not very long but the atmosphere tension and story have done a very good job it is not an action game it is generally played in story mode i bought it as a game that should be in the archives and i liked it very much i recommend it
just buy it
an absolute amazing experience from the story which is unnerving to the immaculate sound design one of the best single player games i have played in a long time
great story and amazing soundtrack id recommend this game even  just based on the rachels love part beautiful experience
